nodes.text: A bass vye was a type of musical instrument. In the cockpit of her A/SF-01 B-wing starfighter, the Theelin pilot Chass na Chadic sometimes listened to a song about agony and revolution played on bass vye and synthtone with singing by a Herglic.

A bass vye first appeared in the current Star Wars canon in 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, which was written by Alexander Freed. The instrument originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it appeared in the short story "Rebel Bass," which was written by Kathy Tyers and published in Star Wars Gamer 6 in 2001.
